title: Software Engineering Manager
summary: Hands-on engineering leader with over nine years of experience building and mentoring high-performing teams to deliver scalable, customer-centric software solutions. Proven success in architecting and developing robust applications with Node.js. React, and AWS, including a high-volume messaging service leveraging AWS Lambda that handles over 350,000 daily messages.
accomplishments: Led a cross-functional team of 5 (engineers, QA, and product) while contributing as an individual developer to rebuild a communication platform for hourly workers and their managers using Node.JS/React.JS, migrating 20,000 users to the new platform in under a year from a Java (Spring Boot) backend and no-code frontend.

Architected and developed the backend for a high-volume messaging service using Twilio and AWS (Lambdas, SQS) that processed over 350,000 outbound and 12,000 inbound messages daily, achieving near real-time interactions between hourly workers and managers.
Developed and implemented a Python scripting API within a Java desktop application, enabling customers to automate workflows and significantly reducing user in-app time by a factor of 30.

Founded Optricity Corp's first engineering team, establishing standard operating procedures based on Agile principles, resulting in a 65% increase in ticket completion rates and instilling a growth mindset in the junior engineers so we could always be building the best thing possible for the organization.

experience.title: Engineering Manager
duties: Spearheaded the complete overhaul of the flagship product, managing a team of three engineers and transitioning over 20,000 users to the new platform in 11 months.
Re-architected the product's Node.js backend and data models, optimizing performance by reducing average database query times by a factor of 200.
Revolutionized the development workflow by implementing robust engineering processes, enabling weekly feature releases.
Provided regular performance reviews and mentored team members.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
duties: Developed a RESTful API for an e-commerce platform using Python/Flask and PostgreSQL on AWS EC2.
Reduced bugs in QA by 70% by implementing a robust unit testing and automated acceptance testing (AAT) framework with pytest and Jest.

experience.title: Director of Technology
duties: Grew the development team from one to four members, establishing all hiring and onboarding processes.
Reduced load times for large projects by 70% by re-architecting the flagship product's project loading process.
Integrated a Python scripting API within the Java product, resulting in a 60% reduction in customer-reported bugs.

experience.title: Software Engineer
duties: Developed a quality control scanner authored in Python/Flask and React to review client data files for any errors, reducing the client success team's help desk tickets by 20%.
Developed a web services API for the Java flagship product, enabling customers to connect their Warehouse Management System directly to the program and eliminating manual file uploads.

education.degree: Master of Science in Materials Science & Engineering
BS in Physics, BA in Computer Science, BA in Mathematics

personal_projects.title: Macro Calculator
personal_projects.description: Developing a mobile application in Flutter to calculate food quantities required to meet specific macronutrient goals for meal planning.

personal_projects.title: Personal Trainer Study Helper
personal_projects.description: Built a mobile study aid using React Native to prepare for personal trainer certification, featuring flashcards and quizzes to reinforce learning.
